name: databaseservertechtest
description: This program should:  * create a server that is accessible on http://localhost:4000/ * When it receives a SET request on http://localhost:4000/set?somekey=somevalue should store the key value pair in memory * When it receieves a GET request on http://localhost:4000/get?key=somekey it should return the value stored at somekey * This data is stored in memory. * At some point (not now) it will need to have a database added
